name: Shehata Antonious
degree: Master in Computer Science, GISMA University - Germany
degree_other: Master Business Administration (MBA), ESLSCA Business School - France
about_text: Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years in .NET (C#, ASP.NET Core), React, Docker and SQL Server, delivering scalable cloud platforms for 500,000+ users. Specialized in microservices, REST APIs, and Azure services; German B1, visa-ready, seeking .NET focused roles.

technical_lead.title: Technical Lead – Egyptian Parliament
technical_lead.details:
• Directed cloud migration to Azure reducing infrastructure costs by 30%
• Established CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps, cutting deployment time from 1 week to 4 hours
• Designed Kubernetes cluster architecture maintaining 99.9% system uptime during parliamentary sessions
• Transitioned monolithic systems to microservices using Docker

senior_engineer.title: Senior Software Engineer – Egyptian Parliament
senior_engineer.details:
• Developed event-driven committee tracking system with RabbitMQ
• Created Xamarin tablet app for 1200 MPs to access documents
• Implemented RESTful APIs connecting parliament with ministries
• Mentored 3 junior developers in .NET Core and clean code practices

software_engineer.title: Software Engineer – Egyptian Parliament
software_engineer.details:
• Built HR management system automating payroll processing (85% reduction in manual work) for 4000+ employees
• Integrated Azure Blob Storage for digital document management
• Optimized SQL queries improving report generation speed by 40%
• Introduced unit testing with xUnit framework

junior_engineer.title: Junior Software Engineer – Egyptian Parliament
junior_engineer.details:
• Developed the official website using ASP.NET MVC and Bootstrap serves 500,000+ users daily
• Migrated legacy IBM DB2 data to SQL Server with zero data loss
• Implemented real-time MP registration system cutting processing time from 3 hours to 15 minutes
• Created stored procedures for complex parliamentary reporting
